sentences.sContent: children’s books which include gratuitous violence
sentences.sCn: 包含无谓暴力内容的儿童书籍

synos.tran: 无理由的，无端的；免费的

remMethod.val: 来自gratuity(n. 小费)； 付小费严格说不是义务， 所以有“无缘无故”之意

words.tran: 无偿地；不必要地；无缘无故地；平白地

trans.tranOther: said or done without a good reason, in a way that offends someone
